title: Don’T Play With My Heart
alternative_title: 霸道校草求我回頭, Come Back To Me, Don't play with my heart, Bàdào xiào cǎo qiú wǒ huítóu
status: 霸道校草求我回頭, Come Back To Me, Don't play with my heart, Bàdào xiào cǎo qiú wǒ huítóu
description:
Description :
        Alternative Name: , Come Back To Me, Bdo xio co qi w hutuSuperficially perfect, but insanely critical of school grass  Tsundere and fierce school scum Lin Shuo's love letter was accidentally sent out, and from then on, school grass Yun Yaoze entangled him and treated him extremely well.But he didn't expect that Yun Yaoze had a demon in his heart, chasing him just to make a bet with his teammates.Yun Yaoze originally thought of love as a game, and breaking up is a gameover, it doesn't matter.But a transfer student came to the school, and the transfer student followed Lin Shuo every day and called out baby, he was in a hurry!
